mapper.sql: id, checkDate, mediaArea, controller, channelNo, lampNo, remark, status, createDate
mapper.update: update le_broken_lamp set checkDate = #{checkDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, mediaArea = #{mediaArea,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, controller = #{controller,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, channelNo = #{channelNo,jdbcType=INTEGER}, lampNo = #{lampNo,jdbcType=INTEGER}, remark = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, status = #{status,jdbcType=CHAR}, createDate = #{createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where id = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
